Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
CpanelHost_Description: Hostname of cPanel server the integration is configured for
CpanelPort_Description: Port number used to connect to cPanel server
CpanelUser_Description: User account used for integration with cPanel server
CpanelPassword_Description: Password of the account used for integration with cPanel server
UserDefaultQuotaMB_Description: Default quota of new email accounts created on cPanel
SupportedServers_Description: List of mail servers the integration applies to, * for all the mail servers
AllowCreateDeleteAccountOnCpanel_Descrip: Enables managing email accounts from within adminpanel interface of our product
AllowAliases_Description: Enables creating mail aliases from our adminpanel
ForwardScriptPath_Description: Filesystem location of custom mail forwarder, defaults to scripts/process_mail.php file
